name: litterbox
description:
A-D - Move E - Pick up item Q - Throw item R - Reset level Escape - Main Menu Escape in Main Menu - Close game

WEBGL link: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/litterbox-webgl

Made by: Kristian, Pilvi, Halla, Mandi

Music on menu and levels: https://chrislsound.itch.io/ambient-puzzle
Music on end screen: https://beepartz.itch.io/fuse-retro-fusion-music-loops
